items.name: glass-avatar
items.title: Glass Avatar
items.description: Circular profile images with gradient glow effects and fallback initials for user representation.

items.name: glass-badge
items.title: Glass Badge
items.description: Small visual indicators for status, labels, or categories with frosted glass styling and color variants.

items.name: glass-button
items.title: Glass Button
items.description: Interactive button components with multiple variants, sizes, and optional glow effects.

items.name: glass-card
items.title: Glass Card
items.description: Flexible container components with frosted glass morphism effect, perfect for displaying grouped content.

items.name: glass-dialog
items.title: Glass Dialog
items.description: Modal dialog components with backdrop blur and smooth animations for confirmations and forms.

items.name: glass-input
items.title: Glass Input
items.description: Form input components with focus glow animations and glass morphism styling.

items.name: glass-progress
items.title: Glass Progress
items.description: Visual indicators for task completion with animated gradient fill and glow effects.

items.name: glass-slider
items.title: Glass Slider
items.description: Range input controls with gradient track, glow effects, and smooth thumb interaction.

items.name: glass-switch
items.title: Glass Switch
items.description: Toggle controls for binary options with smooth transitions and glow effects when activated.

items.name: glass-tabs
items.title: Glass Tabs
items.description: Tabbed interface components with smooth transitions and glass morphism styling.

items.name: glass-tooltip
items.title: Glass Tooltip
items.description: Contextual information popups with glass morphism styling and smooth animations on hover.

items.name: glass-command-palette
items.title: Glass Command Palette
items.description: A spotlight-style command palette with keyboard navigation, search filtering, customizable positioning, and glass morphism styling.

items.name: glass-notification
items.title: Glass Notification
items.description: A customizable notification system with glass morphism styling, allowing for different types of messages and actions.

items.name: glass-dock
items.title: Glass Dock
items.description: A dock component with glass morphism styling and smooth animations.

items.name: glass-gauge
items.title: Glass Gauge
items.description: A gauge component with glass morphism styling, suitable for displaying progress or performance metrics.

items.name: glass-morph-card
items.title: Glass Morph Card
items.description: A card component with a morphing glass effect, suitable for displaying content in a visually appealing way.

items.name: glass-ripple
items.title: Glass Ripple
items.description: A ripple effect component that can be applied to various elements for a dynamic interaction experience.

items.name: glass-spotlight
items.title: Glass Spotlight
items.description: A spotlight component that highlights specific areas of the UI with a glass morphism effect.

items.name: glass-timeline
items.title: Glass Timeline
items.description: A timeline component with glass morphism styling, suitable for displaying events or processes in a chronological order.

items.name: base-widget
items.title: Base Widget
items.description: base widgets component

items.name: calendar-widget
items.title: Calendar Widgets
items.description: Calendar widgets for displaying dates, events, and scheduling information.

items.name: clock-widget
items.title: Clock Widgets
items.description: Clock widgets including analog, digital, world clock, stopwatch, and timer with liquid glass styling.

items.name: admin-panel
items.title: Admin Panel
items.description: A complete admin dashboard built with liquid glass components.
